title: Enjoy Some Fresh Death Stranding Footage
text:
Question is: do you pee standing, or pee while sitting?

These are the important Death Stranding questions of our time. The Tokyo Game Show is in full swing right now, and as promised, Kojima and co. have dropped a ton of fresh gameplay footage ahead of the game's full release in November.

Seven new minutes of footage dropped on the official Kojima Productions trailer earlier today, which you can view below, but there's almost three quarters of an hour of gameplay. First, the trailer:

For the rest of the footage, you can watch the official PlayStation TGS 2019 stream below, although you'll have to do some skipping to get to the Death Stranding bits.

The memes for this will be amazing.
